body: I have been to and ordered from many different furniture stores over the years. Finally Home Furnishings outshines ALL of them. Not only did they have most of the products in stock, but they worked with me to get the right pieces, delivery dates and made sure the sales prices were correct! I spoke with the owner directly during the sales transaction and the many questions that I had and really made me feel "Finally Home". Our pieces our beautiful and may be making more purchases in the near future! I highly recommend this family business!

title: Atenna 1 Dining set
author: Colleen Gilpin
body: What a great company to work with!  David was able to find the set that I wanted at a wonderful price. The delivery team was efficient in the assembly and very kind.  I will absolutely return to this company the next time I need furnishings.

body: Absolutely amazing company to deal with. So Happy that they were able to deliver to Staten Island, N.Y. outstanding customer service and excellent and quick delivery. They outshine any other local store. Will definitely use them in the future.

title: Amazing Service and love my furniture I ordered
author: Kim
body: I have to say the best choice I made with purchasing new furniture.  David was amazing with the customer service from the first time he returned my call about my order.  Down to face timing me to make sure my purchase was what I was expecting since another customer mentioned the color of my particular living room furniture wasn't exactly a true white - it was definitely a darker shade of off white and I wanted a true white -  but I was fine with the color and love the furniture I ordered even more so in person.  The delivery and set up was definitely needed and I will definitely being buying more things from Finally Home Furnishings and working with David!  Definitely recommending to my friends and family as well.

title: Great experience!
author: Dorothy Noland
body: Finally Home Furnishings was able to get my power recliner to me in days.  Other stores were telling me 4-8 weeks!  I had messaged with David on Messenger, telling him I was having surgery soon and needed the chair ASAP.  A few days later I ordered the chair via their website.  Soon after I received an email from David asking if my surgery had been scheduled.  He remembered!  Uncommon (and very appreciated) customer service.
